SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Shukla et al (2015) Residential buildings in India: Energy use projections and savings potentials, Proceedings of the European Council for an Energy Efficienct Economy (ECEEE) Summer Study Conference
Assumptions: Since the BAU Scenario is assumed to have Windows with u-values equivalent to Single pane glass (5.8 W/m2K), and the Moderate Scenario is expecting a 5% penetration of more efficient envelopes (ECBC), it's safe to assume that the current adoption in India is close to 0%. 2.5% assumed in current year.
